ValidationRule.description: Don't allow values in both the 'Employer's % of Total Premium' and 'Member out-of-pocket contribution' at the same time.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT ISBLANK( Employer_s_of_Total_Premium__c ) && NOT ISBLANK( Member_out_of_pocket_contribution__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not have values in both 'Employer's % of Total Premium' and 'Member out-of-pocket contribution' at the same time.
